text: James Wilson Robinson (8 January 1899 - unknown) was a Northern Irish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Belfast. He played for Belfast Junior Football, Manchester United, and Tranmere Rovers. ==References== * * ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1898 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Sportspeople from Belfast Category:Irish association footballers (before 1923) Category:Association football wingers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Tranmere Rovers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: James Robinson (footballer, born 1899)
